How can I retrieve information about a specific currency using the Verus command line interface?

You can retrieve information about a specific currency using the `getcurrency` command followed by the name of the currency. For example:
```
verus getcurrency "currencyname"
```
This will provide you with information about the specified currency.

Examples:
> verus getcurrency "currencyname"
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getcurrency", "params": ["currencyname"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
Can I use other tools to interact with Verus, aside from the command line interface?

Yes, aside from the command line interface, you can also use tools like `curl` to interact with Verus. For example, you can use the following command to retrieve information about a specific currency:
```
curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getcurrency", "params": ["currencyname"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
```
This allows you to access Verus functionality using JSON-RPC over HTTP.

Examples:
> verus getcurrency "currencyname"
> curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "getcurrency", "params": ["currencyname"] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
